date.description: The date of the value: day in `Y-m-d` format, month in `Y-m` format or "Total" for the first element of the list which shows the total values for the whole requested period

vat.description: Tax amounts. If not applicable, it will be 0.

sales_tax.description: Tax amounts. If not applicable, it will be 0.

shipping.description: Shipping costs that were charged by Printful

discount.description: Any fulfillment discounts (such as the monthly discount) set up on Printful's side
